summary: Evakon Tech is seeking a talented and motivated Flutter intern to join our team. As a Flutter intern, you will work closely with our development team to create high-quality mobile applications.
responsibilities: Develop and design mobile applications using Flutter framework.
Adhere to the organization's coding guidelines and best practices.
Complete assigned tasks and projects within given deadlines.
Demonstrate creative thinking to propose innovative ideas.
Receive feedback from managers and implement necessary changes.
requirements: Currently enrolled in a computer science or related program with knowledge of Flutter or a recent graduate
Proficient in Flutter framework and Dart programming language
Attention to detail and ability to deliver high-quality work
Excellent communication and time management skills
Ability to work independently and collaboratively as part of a team

summary: Evakon Tech is seeking a highly motivated and creative UI/UX Designer Intern to join our dynamic and innovative team. As a UI/UX Designer Intern, you will have the opportunity to collaborate with experienced professionals and gain hands-on experience in designing.
responsibilities: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, developers, and other designers, to understand project requirements and goals.
Conduct user research and gather insights to inform the design process.
Create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that effectively communicate the desired user experience.
Iterate on designs based on feedback and user testing to ensure a seamless and intuitive user interface.
Develop and maintain design guidelines, patterns, and best practices.
Assist in the creation of user personas, user flows, and other UX artifacts.
Stay updated with industry trends and emerging design technologies to continually improve design practices.
Contribute to a positive and collaborative work environment, actively participating in design critiques and providing constructive feedback to peers.
requirements: Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, XD), Sketch, or Figma.
Basic understanding of user-centered design principles and methodologies.
Strong visual design skills, with an eye for detail and aesthetics.
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively articulate design concepts and decisions.
Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced environment.
A portfolio showcasing your design projects or case studies that demonstrate your skills and creative thinking.
